column3: good service.  I was craving some tapas(I studied abroad in Spain) and decided to give it a shot.  I had recently been to Cafe Iberico and wanted to try the other Spanish restaurants out.  Ill give the nod to Iberico on food.  Babareeba had good Jamon and cheeses
column4: but Iberico's food overall was amazing.  I'll probably be back
column5: but it's not my first choice for Spanish food if I'm gonna drop $90 for 2.
